title: In Game Chat
body: I cannot reconnect to chat, is anyone having this problem, I've messed with changing system date, restarting my computer, etc. Nothing will fix it, like wtf.. any help would be wonderful..

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
Try going to this thread! It'll help a lot more! http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?show=flat
Same here! Do you live in Texas? Apparently from other posts it's occurring to residents in Texas like myself.
Eh, I'm in Mississippi, I mean its not that far away tbh so it is probably related but I'm just so confused lol
Arkansas. Same problem for hours now.

> [{quoted}](name=DoaD,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=OBOKaosg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-04T16:24:17.924+0000)
>
> Same here! Do you live in Texas? Apparently from other posts it's occurring to residents in Texas like myself.

I'm in Texas! And I can't reconnect. It started last night after two games. Really bizarre, but I get the reconnect button and it still doesn't work.
Yeah I get the reconnect also, when I click it, it attempts to reconnect but after about 5 seconds it shows unsuccessful and remains disconnected. This is so frustrating. :(
